pacman.game.model

Class WorldBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.game.model.WorldBuilder

  • public class WorldBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for creating the main game world. It holds functions and variables to create entities like pacman, ghosts, gumballs and walls.
